property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft 6: Attach 3-D Modeling to a mission card untill the end of the turn. While a mission has a copy of 3-D Modeling attached and you are the Attacker, its objective is reduced by 3.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reaction Combat 8: After an agent plays a combat action: Cancel the action.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Krypt

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Charisma: After an agent is retired: Examine the top of your deck. You may put it into play facedown as an agent or discard it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soldier only. React Combat: Before this agent is retired: This agent is not retired until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft 4: Put Advance Team into play face-up until the end of the turn. Before a player assigns agents to a mission team at the first mission in the queue, discard Advance Team to reduce the maximum number of agents he may assign by one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Transport X: If you are the Defender on a chase mission, Target up to three opposing agents, Send the targets to their headquarters. The TN is the combined transport of the targets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Nine Tiger only. React Combat: After this agent inflicts a wound during a mission: Wound the same target.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Chase - Private - Transport +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker - You may not assign more than 3 agents to this mission Defender - You may not assign more than 4 agents to this mission.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Nine Tiger

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Combat: If this is a fight mission, target a Soldier in your mission team to raise or reduce the mission's objective by 3. Mission Transport: If this is a chase mission, target a Wheelman in your mission team to rise or reduce the mission's objective by 3.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Krypt

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft: After an agent declares a craft action targeting or reacting to an action by one of your agents: Cancel the action.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Fixer - Unique

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft X: After an agent's action is canceled: Retire the agent. The TN is the agent's craft plus expense.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft 7: After Ambush is targeted by an agent's action while it is facedown in play (as if it were an agent or gear): Wound the acting agent twice. This action is performed by your leader.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Flight - Public - Craft +5

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker - Your agents my perform "Mission Combat X: Wound an opposing Exposed agent. The TN is the targets's charisma." Defender - Your agents my perform "Mission Combat X: Wound an opposing Exposed agent. The TN is the targets's charisma."

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft X: After an action redirects to Anton: Cancel the action. The TN is twice the TN of the rederiected action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft 7: Retire a Exposed non-leader agent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Charisma X: After an action targets this agent during an intrigue mission: Wound the acting agent. If this retires the acting agent, the action is canceled. The TN is the acting agent's combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Transport 4: Increase or reduce this mission's onjective by twice the number of Exposed agents in the opposing mission team.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fixer only. Intel Craft: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal one gear card to all players and add it to your hand. Shuffle the remaining card into your deck.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Transport: If this is a chase mission and this agent has a Vehicle gear, target an opposing agent without a Vehicle gear. Move the target agent to his headquarters.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Faceman - Unique

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft: After Augustin is targeted by an action, activate one of your inactive agents: If the activated agent's charisma is equal to or greater than the acting agent's craft, the action is canceled. Retire the activated agent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Combat X: During the Intel Phase, after an agent targets one of your agents with an action: Wound the acting agent. The TN is the agent's combat plus the cover of the first mission in the queue.

property.value: React Transport 3: After this agent is targeted by an action wound this agent: Cancel the action.

property.value: Mission Transport X: Target an opposing agent. Move the target agent to his headquarters. The TN is the target's transport skill.

property.value: Intel Craft: Look at an opponent's hand and discard one card from it. Mission Craft: Discard a card: Look at your opponent's hand and discard a card from it. You may perform this action any number of times per mission.

property.value: Mission Combat: Your agents gain +2 cover until the end of the mission.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Charisma X: After an action targets Tony: Redirect the action. The TN is the craft of the acting agent plus the craft of the new target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Charisma 4: Attach Toxic Attack to an agent. While it's attached, Toxic Attack wounds him after he moves to headquarters from a mission team.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Transport 6: Until the end of the mission, transport actions by enemy agents have +3 TN.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Chase - Public - Charisma +4

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: Your mission team must have a combined transport of 7 or greater to win this mission. Defender: Your actions have +2 TN.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft 5: Discard a mission card from the queue.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Craft 6: Increase this mission's objective by +3.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Charisma 6: After this agent becomes Exposed: Remove the Exposed trait from this agent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Charisma 5: Before this agent performs an action he has already performed this turn: This agent may perform the action a second time this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft: After an Exposed agent performs an action: Cancel the action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soldier only. React Combat X: After an opposing agent performs an action printed on a mission card: Wound an acting agent. The TN is the acting agent's craft.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +2 cover. Tuxedo Liner may not be activated more then once per turn. React: Before this agent takes a wound, deactivate Tuxedo Liner: Prevent the wound.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Vehicle - Aircraft

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wheelman only. React Transport: After this agent is targeted by an action during a chase mission: The acting agent's controller must discard a card from his hand or the action is canceled.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mission Craft 6: Until the end of the mission, actions by enemy agents have +2 TN.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Combat 5: Wound the next agent this turn that discards for bravado.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Combat 5: After one of your other agents is targeted by a combat action: Target the acting agent. The acting agent may either cancel the action or suffer a wound (his choice).

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Transport 9: After an enemy agent performs a React: Cancel the React.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Combat: Retire one of your Exposed agents: Remove the Exposed trait from all of your agents. Remove all wounds from your agents.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Banshee Net

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Transport: Discard all active and inactive gear on Vanessa. Attach Vanessa to one of your other Banshee Net agents. Until the end of the game. Vanessa is considered a gear card with +4 transport.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue - Private - Charisma +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: While you have more cards in your hand than the Defender your agents gain +2 craft Defender: While you have more cards in your hand than the Attacker your agents gain +2 charisma.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Combat 5: After this agent is targeted by a Melee action: Wound the acting agent. If this agent is on a Public mission, expose him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soldier only. Mission Combat X: Retire an opposing lower-expense agent. The TN is the target's combat plus craft.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Charisma 5: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck (15 if this character is a Fixer). You may reveal one Freelancer agent to your opponents and add him to your hand. Shuffle the remining cards back into your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Intrigue - Private - Craft +3

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacker: If you win this mission, remove the Exposed trait from all of your agents. Defender: If you win this mision, expose an agent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft: After this agent assigns to a mission: He gains +3 craft until the end of the mission.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Craft 6: Examine all cards in the mission queue, then rearrange them in any order.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Shadow Pariots

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bureau - Unique

property.name: Rules
property.value: May only be equipped by a Shadow Pariots agent. This agent gains the Pointman trait. React Craft: Before this agent takes a wound, discard Wormwood: Prevent the wound.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intel Charisma 4: Switch a mission in the queue with the top card of the Mission Deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft X: Before this agent performs a Mission action: Examine all inactive gear attached to an enemy agent. The TN is the target's craft.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Krypt

property.name: Rules
property.value: React Craft: After a leader declares to run a mission: One of your agents may immediately perform one Intel action before the Mission Phase begins.
